AETerry,"2011-06-13T12:50:26.777Z","LEGO Minifigure Key Light Review","

Finally I see this Keychain Light show up in the Archives here. I got this particular Key Light as a stocking stuffer for Christmas last year. So either Legoland California had them early or the year this key light is to have come out is wrong.
I rated this a 1 for Building and Parts due to the fact that this isn't intended really as
column2: a toy. It's Gear, much like getting a LEGO hat, shirt, books, cards, ect. You don't really play with it other then posing the arms and legs or turning the light on and off. Incidently, you can angle the light(s) (one for each leg) by how you position the legs. The LEGO logo on the minifigure's torso is the button to hold down for activating the light on or off.

column1: As a Key Chain, I wouldn't really use it for one given that the minifigure is fairly large and I wouldn't want it stuffed into my pockets getting damaged or destroyed. Like many other Keychains I've had over the years, they often get worn out and sometimes break from use.

As a souveneir, Gear and LEGO themed item to display around the house to show my love for the LEGO brand, the minifigure gets a prominent place for display. It certainly is fun and cute to look at or play with.

TooMuchLEGO,"2011-07-23T16:23:22.483Z","See in the Dark","

This set was actually supposed to be a Christmas present, but it fell into my mother's desk drawer and she could never find it. Next thing you know, it pops out of nowhere, and she gives it to me. I like it quite a bit- the figure looks nice, it feels smooth, and the arms are detachable and compatible with standard minifigures (and vice-versa). Not a bad little deal.
Pros

• Cute
  • LEDs Works Great
  • Detachable arms, which are compatible with other minifigs
  • Easy to use
Cons

• Detaching the arms renders them a bit loose- mine tend to fall off a lot.
  • LEGO Logo on chest a bit lopsided

Overall, nice little key light. If you see it, pick it up. Oh, and don't shine it into your face. It's really bright.
